analysis.description:
Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/33/0x6eed4a400ce1e79f41bdf755ea2fac4d4c29d9c6.sol#238-240) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/33/0x6eed4a400ce1e79f41bdf755ea2fac4d4c29d9c6.sol#240)

AllowanceCrowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/33/0x6eed4a400ce1e79f41bdf755ea2fac4d4c29d9c6.sol#316-324) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(tokenWallet,_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/33/0x6eed4a400ce1e79f41bdf755ea2fac4d4c29d9c6.sol#321-323)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/33/0x6eed4a400ce1e79f41bdf755ea2fac4d4c29d9c6.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/33/0x6eed4a400ce1e79f41bdf755ea2fac4d4c29d9c6.sol#1): it allows old versions
